Reviews.Content: booked deniz konak deal expedia modest budget reviews trip advisor arrived saturday afternoon advantage hotels offer transport ataturk airport 20 euros reception told wasnt available day hotels didnt bother 5 minutes called tashkonak fine ground floor noisy night deniz konak hotel hotel 20 building tall people mind heads bit neither wife acually stand shower beam nice clean view sea marmara drawback sea view railway front hotel sea incredibly busy boats drone day night double glazing sleep window breakfast served top floor variety cereals yoghurt cheese meats etc plus tea coffee liked hotel afternoon late night yourself teas coffees liked hotel istanbul 10 minutes hagia sophia blue mosque enjoyed stay hotel slightly annoying pay airport transfers taxi ride hotel organise thye holiday little turkish money left pay card hotel pay cash added charge paying card annoyed didnt feel arguing leaving slightly sour note hotel hostel hotel suited perfectly

Reviews.Title: “superperfect!!!”
Reviews.Author: gistro73
Reviews.Content: hospitality clean staff polite scrumptious breakfast rooftop overseeing marmara sea close main tourist attractions bit looked cosy shame isnt common space relax
